info.description: API for user authentication and job management in MoveShare application
info.title: MoveShare API

get.description: Fetches company data for the current user

patch.description: Partially updates company data for the current user

get.description: Fetches all applications submitted by the current user
Fetches jobs not created by the current user with optional filters and pagination
Fetches all jobs created by the current user

delete.description: Deletes a job created by the current user

post.description: Allows a user to apply for a job
Authenticates a user and returns user details with access and refresh tokens
Creates a new truck for the current user

get.description: Fetches all trucks belonging to the current user
Fetches a specific truck by ID for the current user

put.description: Updates an existing truck for the current user

delete.description: Deletes a truck for the current user

get.description: Fetches all photos for a specific truck

post.description: Uploads one or more photos for a specific truck

delete.description: Deletes a specific photo for a truck
